channel.title: João Brogueira de Sousa
channel.description: Recent content on João Brogueira de Sousa

item.title: Research
item.author: jbsousa@ucp.pt (João Brogueira de Sousa)
item.description: Working papers Introducing an Austrian Backpack in Spain, with Julián Diáz-Saavedra and Ramon Marimon. On the Design of a European Unemployment Insurance System, with Árpád Ábrahám, Ramon Marimon and Lukas Mayr. Publications Existence and uniqueness of equilibrium in Lucas’ Asset Pricing model when utility is unbounded, with Fabian Schuetze, in Economic Theory Bulletin (2017). Related notebook at QuantEcon.org.

item.title: Teaching
item.author: jbsousa@ucp.pt (João Brogueira de Sousa)
item.description: NOTE: This page is currently under construction and will be updated often. Python for Finance, MSc in Finance at Universidade Católica Portuguesa You can find the course material in this GitHub repository. Intro to Python, MSc in Economics at Universidade Católica Portuguesa New material coming soon. In case you don't have a GitHub account, sign up for free and clone or download the course's repository linked above.

item.title: about
item.author: jbsousa@ucp.pt (João Brogueira de Sousa)
item.description: I'm a postdoctoral researcher in Economics at Universidade Católica Portuguesa, in Lisbon. I obtained a PhD in Economics at the European University Institute. In this website you can find my work in quantitative macroeconomics, as well as the Python courses I currently teach at Católica. You can find most of the code I work with in GitHub.
